name: Sunny sunny
description:
A little sunny game, made for the Miracle Jam. A love letter to our favorite mechanics and themes.

Try to grow the Sunflower as tall as possible OR relax and shoot some hoops in Sunny Sunny.

Created By

Sean-Kee Murmann - @MutinySean

Kasandra Hansen Standal - @MutinyKas

Charlie Hutchinson - @CHutchDesign

Jonny Lee - @ JunnyLee

Lucy Stent

Controls:

A, DMove Left or RightW or SpacebarJump/Walljump/ResetJumpSSmash downLeft Click(Hold + Drag) Aim ShotPPause
